arguments.name: SRC
arguments.description: Source code file(s) or directory(s) to format.

options.name: --code
options.description: Format the code passed in as a string.

options.name: --line-length
options.description: How many characters per line to allow. [default: 88]

options.name: --target-version
options.description: Python versions that should be supported by Black's output...

options.name: --pyi
options.description: Format all input files like typing stubs regardless of file extension.

options.name: --ipynb
options.description: Format all input files like Jupyter Notebooks regardless of file extension.

options.name: --skip-source-first-line
options.description: Skip the first line of the source code.

options.name: --skip-string-normalization
options.description: Don't normalize string quotes or prefixes.

options.name: --skip-magic-trailing-comma
options.description: Don't use trailing commas as a reason to split lines.

options.name: --preview
options.description: Enable potentially disruptive style changes...

options.name: --unstable
options.description: Enable potentially disruptive style changes that have known bugs... Implies --preview.

options.name: --check
options.description: Don't write the files back, just return the status...

options.name: --diff
options.description: Don't write the files back, just output a diff...

options.name: --color
options.description: Show colored diff. Only applies when --diff is given.

options.name: --no-color
options.description: Do not show colored diff. Only applies when --diff is given.

options.name: --fast
options.description: Turns off AST safety check after formatting.

options.name: --safe
options.description: Explicitly enables AST safety check. [default: --safe]

options.name: --exclude
options.description: A regular expression that matches files and directories that should be excluded... [default: /.../].

options.name: --extend-exclude
options.description: Like --exclude, but adds additional files and directories on top of the default values...

options.name: --force-exclude
options.description: Like --exclude, but files matching this regex will be excluded even when passed explicitly...

options.name: --include
options.description: A regular expression that matches files and directories that should be included... [default: (.pyi?|.ipynb)$]

options.name: --workers
options.description: Controls the number of parallel workers... Defaults to the number of CPUs.

options.name: --quiet
options.description: Stop emitting all non-critical output.

options.name: --verbose
options.description: Emit messages about files that were not changed or were ignored...

options.name: --version
options.description: Show the version and exit.

options.name: --config
options.description: Read configuration options from a configuration file.

options.name: --help
options.description: Show this message and exit.
